description: This file implements a platform-independent utility function for creating an HTTP Helper Container object, including licensing information, module description, and a factory function 'HttpCreateHelperContainer' that calls 'HttpHcoCreate'.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpCreateHelperContainer(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: A factory function to create an HTTP Helper Container object, wrapping the call to 'HttpHcoCreate' with provided context handles.
